availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, policeman. Married Ann "Annie" Uptonia Beckwith Reaugh in Jefferson County, Kentucky on January 10, 1837. Father of Upton B. Reaugh and Fanny Reaugh. Constable in Louisville in 1850. Policeman in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, Louisville District 2, p. 180A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 4, p. 100.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Richland, Olney Ward 2, p. 609A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482706, p. 198.
